name: Downward Dog
description: A foundational yoga pose that stretches the entire body.
steps: Start on your hands and knees.
Lift your hips towards the ceiling.
Straighten your legs and press your heels towards the floor.
Keep your head relaxed and gaze at your feet.
techniques: Distribute weight evenly between hands and feet.

name: Tree Pose
description: A balancing pose that strengthens the legs and core.
steps: Stand tall with your feet together.
Shift your weight onto one foot.
Place the sole of the other foot on your inner thigh or calf.
Bring your hands together in a prayer position at your chest.
techniques: Focus on a fixed point to maintain balance.
Keep your standing leg strong and engaged.
Avoid placing your foot on the knee joint.
